name: Esperdica
text:
...We've walked a lot today,
so how would you take me up on a sweet blend?
Since we've stopped by the shop, and all.

name: Esperdica
text:
I'll brew you a gentle cup that will
envelop your fatigue and make it melt away.

name: Esperdica
text:
...Before that,
if I may take your coat.

[Player] handed their coat to Esperdica, who smiled gently,
then took out a small box from their bag.

name: Esperdica
text:
[Player]-san.
This is...

name: Esperdica
text:
Thank you.
To receive such a wonderful gift from you.

name: Esperdica
text:
Hehe.
It smells of fragrant cacao.
May I try it right away?

Seeing [Player] nod,
Esperdica put a piece of gateau chocolat into his mouth,
afterwards breaking into a smile.

name: Esperdica
text:
It's very delicious...!
This is homemade, isn't it?
I can tell it was made with great care.

name: Esperdica
text:
...Since I've received such delicious chocolate,
I'll have to change the blend.

name: Esperdica
text:
Let's see...
A blend that will bring out the flavor
of the chocolate I received from [Player]-san...

name: Esperdica
text:
Deep roasted, with a vivid taste of richness and bitterness...
Would such a blend be suitable?

Esperdica enjoyed selecting the beans,
and smoothly proceeded with the preparations.

name: Esperdica
text:
...The flexibility to adapt to any situation.
That is one of the charms of coffee,
I believe.

name: Esperdica
text:
For example, a satisfying cup with a profound aroma
can serve as the main character of a space.

name: Esperdica
text:
And sometimes, alike that of a superb supporting actor,
it can enhance the delicate sweetness of chocolate.

name: Esperdica
text:
So, here it is.
I hope you can enjoy it while it is still hot.

What was offered to [Player] was a refreshing cup with a clear aroma,
and—

A truffle chocolate shaped like a paw print,
gently placed on the saucer.

name: Esperdica
text:
Oh, [Player]-san.
What's wrong?
Why the surprised face?

name: Esperdica
text:
...Before you say anything,
please try it.
I'm sure you'll like it.

As told, [Player] put the truffle in their mouth,
and with a smooth melt, a fruity sweet and sour taste spread.
And naturally, their hand reached for the coffee cup, which was still steaming.

name: Esperdica
text:
Hehehe.
Two completely different flavors,
yet they enhance each other and create a wonderous harmony.

name: Esperdica
text:
Irresistibly drawn to each other,
desiring each other.
...It's quite mysterious, isn't it?
When [Player] gently placed the coffee cup on the saucer—
The soft fur and springy paw pad felt ticklish against [Player]'s hand.
